entry.title: Siser HTV Holographic Bundle (ALL 18 colours)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Siser Glitter
Price: 47.80 - 153.90 (3 variants)

The full bundle of Siser Holographic HTV contains 18 sheets; one of each colour we have in our collection. 

Unfortunately, pictures do not represent the depth of colour and the intensity of the sparkle offered by this product.

Do you like rhinestone effects on garments or cushions but fear the amount of work involved?Fear no more!  You need to try the faux rhinestone technique made with Siser Holographic HTV.  It will give you a very similar effect in no time. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qhm4QpakUvY

entry.title: Fall HTV Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Bundle
Price: 31.25 - 59.00 (2 variants)

In this beautiful Fall shades bundle, you get 8 different sheets of mixed Heat Transfer Vinyl including a sheet of Glow in the Dark, and save 15% off the regular price.  This bundle is available in single size sheet (15"x12" and 10"x12") and in double size sheets (15"x24" and 20"x12").  You get one of each of the following products:

- Siser EasyWeed Stretch - Black

- Siser EasyWeed Glow in the Dark 

- Siser EasyWeed Texas Orange

- Siser EasyWeed Stretch - Green

- Siser EasyWeed Stretch - Sun Yellow

- Siser Holographic - Gold

- Siser Glitter - Copper

- Siser Glitter - Dark Green

entry.title: Siser StripFlock HTV - BUNDLE All 14 Colours
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Siser StripFlock Bundle
Price: 40.95 - 195.30 (4 variants)

This bundle includes all 14 colours.

SISER StripFlock® Heat Transfer Material

The Only Flock in the Industry That can be Layered on Itself!

A great alternative to embroidery, StripFlock® gives logos a raised, textured, suede-like feel. Excellent for retro designs or anytime you want a rich look. Stripflock® can be used as a base layer and covered with other materials, giving a very unique, high-end look to logos and designs. In addition, StripFlock® is very opaque and has deep, rich colors that are great for animal prints and for layering on top of other materials.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D6yhkPD3_O4

Adheres to:

- 100% cotton
- 100% polyester
- Poly/cotton blends
- Leather
- Sublimated polyester

It is always recommended to do a test on a fabric swatch. 

Application Instructions

Preheat: 2-3 seconds
Pressure: Medium
Temperature: 320 F / 160
Peel: Cold

Washing Instructions

  • Turn garment inside out.
  • Machine wash COLD with mild detergent.
  • NO bleach.
  • Dry at a normal dryer setting on household machines.
  • Do not dry clean.

entry.title: Patterned HTV - Make your Bundle - 12" X 12"
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Patterned HTV
Price: 16.56 - 53.20 (3 variants)

Create your own bundle of Patterned HTV and SAVE a bundle !!!

Don't be fooled by lower quality products, our patterns are printed on top quality Siser printable HTV.

Each sheet measures approximately 12"x12" and comes with it's sheet of Siser TTD Mask.  You may mix and match patterns from all series. 

Please don't forget to include your choices of patterns in your order.  You may click on "Add a note to your order" appearing on the left of your screen once you add this product to your cart.  A box will open for you to include your choices.

Contrary to other suppliers, your transfer mask is INCLUDED with each sheet of patterned HTV you purchase from us. he Mask can be reused many times. Additional sheets are available for purchase here: 

https://scriptdesigns.myshopify.com/collections/patterned-heat-transfer-vinyl-htv/products/ttd-mask-transfer-medium-for-patterned-htv?variant=31552214662

Application instructions can be found in the Category definition.

Note:  Orders containing patterned products may need 3 to 4 additional working days to process as they need to dry properly before they can be packaged.

entry.title: Make your Own Dozen - EasyWeed Stretch HTV Bundles
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Siser Easyweed HTV - Stretch
Price: 32.40 - 550.80 (5 variants)

Choose 12 colours of the Siser EasyWeed Stretch HTV sheets or rolls and the size of your bundle.  Available in 5 different sizes:  6" x 15", 12" x 15",  24" x 15, 1 yard x 15" and 5 yards x 15".  If you are looking for rolls bigger than 5 yards, send us a message.

Bundles cannot be made of a single colour.  You must choose different colours.  A few repeats are acceptable.

Note that other EasyWeed products cannot be included; they are different lines of product.  This bundle is for Stretch products only.  

Leave a note with your order specifying your colour choices (Colour numbers and names please).  

Please note that the Siser Easyweed HTV doesn't measure exactly 15 inches wide, it is closer to 14 3/4".

entry.title: Make your Own Dozen - EasyWeed HTV Bundles
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Siser Easyweed HTV
Price: 31.85 - 529.20 (5 variants)

Choose 12 colours of the regular Siser EasyWeed HTV sheets or rolls and the size of your bundle.  Available in 5 different sizes:  6" x 15", 12" x 15",  24" x 15, 1 yard x 15" and 5 yards x 15".  If you are looking for rolls bigger than 5 yards, send us a message.

Bundles cannot be made of a single colour.  You must choose different colours.  Each colour may be repeated up to 3 times.

Please note that the Siser Easyweed HTV doesn't measure exactly 15 inches wide, it is closer to 14 3/4".
